import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./Card.scss" const Card = (props) => { const [arr, setArr] = useState([]); const containerRef = useRef(null); const [scrollPosition, setScrollPosition] = useState(0); function handleScroll(event) { const { scrollTop, clientHeight, scrollHeight } = event.target; console.log(scrollTop); // Проверка, достигнут ли верх контейнера if (scrollTop === 100) { containerRef.current.scrollBy(0, -400); setScrollPosition(scrollTop - 400); } // Проверка, достигнут ли конец контейнера else if (scrollTop + clientHeight === scrollHeight) { containerRef.current.scrollBy(0, 400); setScrollPosition(scrollTop + 400); } } return (
